thread.title: 2017 Oscars Red Carpet Arrivals Gallery | Variety
thread.title_full: 2017 Oscars Red Carpet Arrivals Gallery | Variety

author: Jacob Bryant
title: 2017 Oscars Red Carpet Arrivals Gallery | Variety
text:
Isabelle Huppert sparkled in a champagne in Armani Prive. 
Best actress nominee Ruth Negga hit the Oscars carpet sporting an ACLU ribbon. 
Taraji P. Henson’s Alberrta Feretti dress was just a backdrop for her stunning statement necklace. 
Emma Roberts wore a vintage Armani dress with a plunging neckline. 
Felicity Jones also opted for a pale colored dress. 
Barry Jenkins is looking to make history tonight with his breakout film “Moonlight.” 
Leslie Mann looked like a ray of sunshine in this yellow gown. 
Chrissy Teigen wore a sparkly, sexy Zuhair Murad gown. 
Sofia Carson struck a pose before hosting the “The Oscars: All Access” web show. 
Sting and his wife Trudie Styler on the arrivals line. The singer is performing an Oscar-nominated song. 
Jerry O’Connell looked dapper in a traditional black tux. 
Ryan Seacrest opted for a white jacket for the big event. 
Sunny Pawar, the child actor in “Lion,” gave an enthusiastic thumbs up. 
Supermodel Karlie Kloss wore a caped gown, one of the trends of the evening. 
Andrew Garfield is up for a best actor award for “Hacksaw Ridge.” 
Lucas Hedges still in’t believe he’s an Oscar nominee, saying it feels like a “fairytale.” 
Riz Ahmed looked sharp in this royal blue Zegna tux. 
Presenter Hailee Steinfeld brought the drama in this high collared white and iridescent Ralph & Russo gown. 
Chrissy Teigen and John Legend were giving up relationship goals on the carpet. Legend will be performing songs from “La La Land” during the telecast. 
Justin Timberlake playfully photobombed wife Jessica Biel. Jessica wore a shimmery Kaufman Franco dress. 
Ava DuVernay wore an ornate Ashi dress. Her documentary “13” is up for an Oscar. 
Octavia Spencer floated in a feathery Marchesa gown. 
Kirsten Dunst channeled old Hollywood glamour in Christian Dior. 
The petite Kelly Ripa wore a voluminous navy ball gown. 
Gael Garcia Bernal was one of many male attendees dressed in Dior Homme. 
Director Miranda July also wore an ACLU ribbon on the red carpet. 
David Oyelowo and Jessica Oyelowo 
Jessica Biel paired eye-catching Kaufman Franco gown with Cartier jewels. 
Dev Patel wore a cream-colored jacket and arrived with his mom. 
Glen Powell is part of the “Hidden Fingers” nominated dress. 
Luciana Barroso wore a dress with a plunging neckline, but her best accessory was husband Matt Damon. 
Michael J. Fox and wife Tracy Pollan arrived arm in arm. Tracy is wearing “Project Runway” winner Christian Siriano. 
Teresa Palmer sparkled in a silvery gown. 
Dakota Johnson made a statement in a champagne Gucci dress and Cartier jewels. 
Janelle Monae wore Elie Saab, in her trademark black and white, as usual. Image: David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock
